sentences.english: The paper discusses design requirements from the perspective of manikin engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文從人體工程學角度論述了椅子的設計要求。

sentences.english: D adviser for School of Information and Telecommunication Engineering, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT).
sentences.chinese: 北京郵電大學信息與通信工程學院兼職博導。

sentences.english: This course is an elective course for graduate students in School of Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本課程是機械與動力工程學院研究生的一門選修課。

sentences.english: Their inventions have contributed to the development of electrical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 他們的發明有助於電氣工程學的發展。

sentences.english: If you want to apply for that position a B. E is required.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想申請那個職位得具備工程學專業的學士學位。

sentences.english: Our reporter interviewed the Beijing university of posts and telecommunications and telecom engineering college professor Chen lei.
sentences.chinese: 本報記者採訪了北京郵電大學電信工程學院教授陳磊。

sentences.english: Proteomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白質體工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。

sentences.english: Many people think that information technology and biotechnology will rule the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲，信息技術和生物工程學將主宰21世紀。

sentences.english: How to apply hard science and engineering to everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 怎樣將天然科學與工程學運用於日常生活。

sentences.english: They were specifically designed after a comprehensive study of ergonomics.
sentences.chinese: 他們是經過特別設計，人機工程學全面的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To simulate the human pulse patterns expressively and objectively by using engineering technique.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用工程學方法形象客觀地模擬人體各種脈象。

sentences.english: System include ergonomic-sloping front desig for easy acce am cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 人體工程學應用其中，保證操作的輕鬆及清潔的便捷。

sentences.english: Becouse adopting the point of man-machine engineering, the environment quality is improved.
sentences.chinese: 採用人機工程學觀點，改善環境質量。

sentences.english: We look forward to welcoming you to Queen Mary.
sentences.chinese: 西工大倫敦瑪麗女王大學工程學院歡迎你的到來。

sentences.english: Easy to operate, with length designed according to the proportion of human enginnering.
sentences.chinese: 易操作，長短按人體工程學比例設計。
